title: Motivation has a shelf life
excerpt: It ebbs and flows. Some weeks slower than others.

children.text: It ebbs and flows. Some weeks slower than others.
The first insight is to take advantage of it when it's there. To absorb yourself in something when it strikes you.

The second insight is to realize that waiting on motivation to consistently empower you is a bad strategy. That daily discipline and force of habit are far more reliable ways to get you where you want to go.
